moves.4... d5 5. exd5 Nxd5 6. Nxf7: This will make his King move and come out to the middle of the board
moves.6... Kxf7 7. Qf3+: Checking and threatening the knight. Most possible move: King supporting the knight. But then the King will be even more out to the middle of the board
moves.10... Qd6 11. O-O Nd7:
Move for supporting the e-pawn... If f4xe5 then Kd7xe5 and I would lose all the try I did to pull his King out.
But...
moves.12. g4 Nd7b6: Big mistake. He didnt see the checkmate, obviously.
moves.13. Qf5#: Checkmate! The issue was that his King should remain at the middle of the board. Great Fast Game!
